Pog game but the devs are idiots. They just nerf all the fun perks and need to do a lot about the maps and just fixing general bullshit. That will not stop me from playing this amazing game with weekly updates to the store, and major bi-Monthly patches and updates. The devs honestly don't get enough credit. Great replayability. Have an amazing time playing online co-op as well. I am very pro-cross platform for this game and I'd like to play with my peasant console friends.

Unbalanced gameplay (at higher ranks) if you are not good enough, but it is is very fun if you know what you're doing. The community is the worst, the most toxic I have seen, you should try to avoid that, just say gg and leave, or just leave. Killers are all fun to play but most of them are paid so you'll either have to buy them using real money or in-game money that you made by leveling up, but that takes a very long time to make. That's it, try having fun in this game or suffer the toxicity and rage quit

Honestly, It's sad to say but the last few months have been rougher and rougher for DBD. Poor balance choices with no real direction or community influence, a vast increase in the number of consistent bugs, and greedy anti-consumer practices by the dev's has soured my mood for DBD. The Eternal Blight event and the insane amount of censorship by forum/discord moderators have both been the last nail in the coffin for me. I'll still occasionally play, but the following 4 core issues would need to be addressed to really make me want to enjoy the game. Balance, Bugs, The Community, The Developers. Yes It is at the point where I'd hate to say it, but some people at Behaviour (not mentioning names) should actually be fired and replaced to get the game on track.

Only having played for 18 hours, and already having a scream of a time being chased by a Demogorgon, Freddy Krueger, and Leatherface... this game is good with or without friends.  I wish you were able to choose a handful of non-copyright survivors first, and then the game had you play for the ones you didn't choose first.  Aside from that, do your homework on DLCs, and prepare for a screaming good time.

This game is amazing, played countless hours on the XB1 and now PC, you just keep coming back for more. Really fun and would fully recommend to anyone that is thinking about getting this game.

DbD is a 5 player game involving 2 teams, 4 survivors and 1 killer.   There's a lot of different passive abilities in the game that makes every match a bit different with several maps as well.

I think its a great party game but i'm not sure how people play this as a main game and primarily choose it over anything else.  That being said, it is my favourite game on Steam.

《黎明杀机》是一款多人生存恐怖游戏，化身幸存者单独或是组队去面临未知的威胁。游戏中，四名玩家将试图逃过杀手的追杀、生存下去，过程中幸存者将面临各种抉择时刻，每个选择都将影响生存机会，而一名玩家将扮演杀手角色，通过独特力量跟踪，并在受害者安全逃脱之前追捕他们。作为不公平1v4类型的gaem，黎明杀机的平衡性还是中规中矩的，一些过于bug的角色会被修改，汉化也比较完整。和朋友一起玩，实在是蛮开心的。

It's a pretty heckin good game. People over-exaggerate the toxicity of the community too.
Definitely not for everyone, but worth giving a try to see if you like it. :)
